entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Ice pellets or snow beginning this evening and ending after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning late in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
